price: They could not withstand it, nor could they ward it off.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
